title: Jack of Spades
description: “YOU’RE AT MY MERCY NOW, AMORE.” Sorry, bella. You got dealt the losing hand. Witness to a crime, you’re my prisoner now. I didn’t mean for things to happen this way, But tying you to my bed and making you scream is an unexpected pleasure. A privilege, really. And even if I did trust you, now that I’ve had a taste, I’m not sure I’d let you go...  Jack of Spades  is a stand-alone romance in the interconnected Vegas Underground series. No cliffhangers, no cheating.
author: Renee Rose
